channel.title: Technology Detection on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Technology Detection on ZAP

item.title: Wappalyzer API
item.description: Wappalyzer API The following views are available via the API: Views listSites: Lists all the sites recognized by the wappalyzer addon. listAll: Lists all sites and their associated applications (technologies). listSite (site*): Lists all the applications (technologies) associated with the specified site. See also Wappalyzer
